properties.displayName: Hiding User Account Via SpecialAccounts Registry Key
properties.query:
DeviceRegistryEvents
| where RegistryValueData =~ "DWORD (0x00000000)" and ActionType =~ "RegistryValueSet" and RegistryKey contains "\\SOFTWARE\\Microsoft\\Windows NT\\CurrentVersion\\Winlogon\\SpecialAccounts\\UserList"

tags.name: description
tags.value: Detects modifications to the registry key "HKLM\Software\Microsoft\Windows NT\CurrentVersion\Winlogon\SpecialAccounts\Userlist" where the value is set to "0" in order to hide user account from being listed on the logon screen.
